events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
After evaluating your profile, we have categorized your application under the engineering department for further processing.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps in the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening interview to discuss your experience and skills relevant to the software engineer role.
The candidate responded promptly to our screening follow-up, expressing strong interest and availability for next steps.
A technical interview has been scheduled to further assess your coding abilities and problem-solving skills.
